resources.string: Welcome to our cozy coffee corner, where every cup is a delightful for you.
Fall in Love with Coffee in Blissful Delight!

A cappuccino is an approximately 150 ml (5 oz) beverage, with 25 ml of espresso coffee and 85ml of fresh milk the foamed milk creates a rich, creamy texture that complements the strong flavor of the espresso, resulting in a balanced and satisfying drink that is often enjoyed as a morning pick-me-up or an afternoon treat.
